name: Crossfire (itch)
description:
Crossfire is a top down, team based, arena vehicle combat for up to four players. Each player controls a vehicle, and must figure out who their teammate is via the game pad's vibration in order to take out the other team. Each vehicle has offensive targeting missiles as well as a single use short range defensive shield to destroy incoming missiles. Last team standing wins.

Controls:
Crossfire supports up to 4 XBOX360 controllers.

  • Left stick moves.
  • Right stick aims.
  • Right trigger shoots.
  • Left trigger deploys single use shield.
  • Back button exits the game.

If you don't have any controllers, you can still get a feel for Crossfire with the keyboard (single player controls only):

  • Arrow keys move.
  • Enter/Return to 'continue'.
  • P shoots.
  • D deploys single use shield.
  • ESC exits the game.
